::Koj::

Koj looks at the sword "7 years I've had the Tetsusaiga my farthers steel 
cleaving fang not once has it turned until now." Koj hold up the sword to 
defend against the blast as it absorbs the first one but he is consumed by 
the second.

::Inu-Yasha::

Looks almost fearful.

::Koj::

As the smoke and Fire Clear there stands Koj leaning on the Fang his armor 
marred and burned   "Don't you dare under estimate me you erogant bastard." 
As the Fang Resounds in his hand "This is yours Lai It Tai Strike" Swings 
the Fang as sends a cresant of the laser Rifel enegry back at Oblitertron.
